LABEL: 0x42F
STRING: 「That's an interesting outfit.」

LABEL: 0x45E
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san, don't say it so bluntly...」

LABEL: 0x4A7
STRING: 「No, no. I was praising you.」

LABEL: 0x4D7
STRING: 「I've always thought that while you have an adorable mind, your appearance is rather mediocre, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x57D
STRING: 「Don't you think so too, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x67C
STRING: 「I think it suits you well, in any case.」

LABEL: 0x6BB
STRING: 「Absolutely.」

LABEL: 0x6DE
STRING: 「Hold on.」

LABEL: 0x734
STRING: The <SHEEP III>, front section, second floor.

LABEL: 0x75D
STRING: Under the usual dim lights, we were preparing for our next move. However...

LABEL: 0x7B9
STRING: Those two were hitting it off, leaving me feeling out of place.

LABEL: 0x7EF
STRING: Bathed in their lukewarm gazes, I removed the head of the thing I was wearing.

LABEL: 0x860
STRING: 「Phwaah...」

LABEL: 0x87A
STRING: A sense of release.

LABEL: 0x890
STRING: I took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x8A6
STRING: The outside air felt good on my sweaty skin.

LABEL: 0x8D0
STRING: This thing was so airtight that it could be a diving suit...

LABEL: 0x8FE
STRING: But, what I was wearing was not one.

LABEL: 0x9A8
STRING: 「Ah, you mustn't remove your head in public.」

LABEL: 0x9DE
STRING: 「You're not ready to be a costume actor, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xA2F
STRING: How ready would one have to be for that?

LABEL: 0xA6B
STRING: Well, in any case...

LABEL: 0xA91
STRING: Right now, I was wearing a strange costume that we had found in the warehouse.

LABEL: 0xB9F
STRING: 「What is this thing supposed to be...?」

LABEL: 0xBD8
STRING: 「A macaroni penguin.」

LABEL: 0xC05
STRING: 「If you say so...」

LABEL: 0xC27
STRING: It was the mysterious costume I'd seen back in the warehouse, a macaroni penguin.

LABEL: 0xC6D
STRING: I didn't know why I was wearing it right now.

LABEL: 0xCAB
STRING: But one thing I did know was that it was extremely hard to breathe while wearing it.

LABEL: 0xD87
STRING: 「As one would expect. It's flawless.」

LABEL: 0xDB0
STRING: What was that supposed to mean?

LABEL: 0xDD5
STRING: 「It has zero ventilation, which naturally led to complaints from those who tried it on.」

LABEL: 0xE2D
STRING: 「Some even said it'd be murder to stand on an outdoor event stage wearing this during the summer.」

LABEL: 0xEA0
STRING: 「So, why would something like this be in this ship's warehouse...?」

LABEL: 0xF52
STRING: 「That's obvious.」

LABEL: 0xF7A
STRING: 「Because it's cute.」

LABEL: 0xF9F
STRING: 「Cute...?」

LABEL: 0xFC1
STRING: I stared at the head of the costume in my hand.

LABEL: 0x1043
STRING: It looked like a penguin, but also like a whale.

LABEL: 0x1087
STRING: There was no light in its round eyes, and there was a flirtatious smile on its otherwise emotionless face.

LABEL: 0x10E9
STRING: Sure enough, just like Tokiwa said, this was...

LABEL: 0x111B
STRING: ...No comment, I guess.

LABEL: 0x11AD
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x11D9
STRING: 「This is the first time I've ever seen a face that fits the expression "biting down a bitter bug" so well.」

LABEL: 0x1254
STRING: 「It's nothing...」

LABEL: 0x126E
STRING: 「Seems like this costume would be a hit with the kids.」

LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: 「Well, let's put that aside for now.」

LABEL: 0x139D
STRING: 「At least for our purpose, it's perfect.」

LABEL: 0x13DC
STRING: Our purpose――

LABEL: 0x13F8
STRING: That's right. We didn't bring this out just to admire the animal costume.

LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: So, even if it was a bit awkward――

LABEL: 0x14AC
STRING: 「...Let me see that head.」

LABEL: 0x14D4
STRING: A head with a curious appearance.

LABEL: 0x14FA
STRING: Well, it wasn't that I didn't like wearing it...

LABEL: 0x1607
STRING: 「We know that <COOS> is basically nothing more than a blood infection.」

LABEL: 0x1653
STRING: 「But, we should also take precautions against droplet infection, just in case.」

LABEL: 0x16FA
STRING: 「...So, that's how it is.」

LABEL: 0x173D
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x17C7
STRING: 「That head is a perfect substitute for a mask.」

LABEL: 0x1803
STRING: 「...I never thought that the lack of ventilation, which makes you sweat in a manner of minutes, would come in handy like this...」

LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: That was just a design error.

LABEL: 0x188A
STRING: Tokiwa seemed dissatisfied with my poor handling of the costume.

LABEL: 0x18C6
STRING: However, no matter how much I disagreed with it, this thing was useful for our cause.

LABEL: 0x1998
STRING: 「Well, I'm off.」

LABEL: 0x19CF
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x19F0
STRING: The moment I lifted the headpiece and tried to put it on, Yukari called out to me.

LABEL: 0x1A34
STRING: When I turned back to her, she looked away, somewhat embarrassed.

LABEL: 0x1AD5
STRING: 「Yukari-san...?」

LABEL: 0x1B02
STRING: 「Normally, I wouldn't allow something this reckless to happen...」

LABEL: 0x1B46
STRING: 「It's a little late to be saying this now, but I didn't really want to make you, a passenger, do this...」

LABEL: 0x1BAB
STRING: 「Isn't this what I always do?」

LABEL: 0x1C3D
STRING: 「It wouldn't do any good to try and stop you anyway.」

LABEL: 0x1C74
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x1C8A
STRING: We've had this back-and-forth so many times that I've gotten used to it.

LABEL: 0x1CC0
STRING: I might be putting myself in danger, but...

LABEL: 0x1CEA
STRING: At times like these, it was natural for me, who was stronger than the girls and didn't have as much skill or knowledge as Hiragino, to volunteer...

LABEL: 0x1D62
STRING: And each time, Yukari would worry about me and argue against it.

LABEL: 0x1E2A
STRING: 「I'm starting to understand you, little by little.」

LABEL: 0x1E69
STRING: She let out a little laugh.

LABEL: 0x1E89
STRING: I felt like I'd gained a bit more trust with her, somehow.

LABEL: 0x1EBB
STRING: Finally, after much feuding and overcoming hostility.

LABEL: 0x1F1A
STRING: 「I only have one request.」

LABEL: 0x1FB2
STRING: Tokiwa stomped over to me and patted the macaroni penguin on the head.

LABEL: 0x200E
STRING: Putting it on, I transformed from a human into a macaroni penguin.

LABEL: 0x20D0
STRING: 「Please don't kill it.」

LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: 「Try not to step on the flowers on the asphalt...」

LABEL: 0x2141
STRING: 「Yeah, I get it. I'll be careful.」

LABEL: 0x21DB
STRING: 「Yes, good boy.」

LABEL: 0x2204
STRING: She then patted my head and shook my hand.

LABEL: 0x223A
STRING: ...Did she realize that I was the one inside this costume?

LABEL: 0x22AA
STRING: After shaking hands, she asked for a hug but was held back by Yukari.

LABEL: 0x23C1
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x23DB
STRING: 「If you crush a creature infected with <COOS> and get splashed with it's bodily fluids,

LABEL: 0x2427
STRING: there's a chance you'll get infected.」

LABEL: 0x2455
STRING: 「It's true that we're facing an abominable opponent, but don't kill the luminescent creatures carelessly...」

LABEL: 0x250E
STRING: 「...They're victims too.」

LABEL: 0x2542
STRING: 「Not that I'm one to tell you that...」

LABEL: 0x257D
STRING: 「No, thanks for the warning.」

LABEL: 0x2600
STRING: With that, I faced the two while wearing the animal costume.

LABEL: 0x2648
STRING: 「Okay then, I'm off.」

LABEL: 0x2739
STRING: 「I'm counting on you.」

LABEL: 0x2764
STRING: 「Bye-bye, macaroni penguin-chan.」

LABEL: 0x279D
STRING: I waved to Tokiwa and left the two behind.

LABEL: 0x2947
STRING: One step at a time, I climbed the stairs.

LABEL: 0x2973
STRING: Alone.

LABEL: 0x2989
STRING: With heavy footsteps.

LABEL: 0x29A5
STRING: Although not as heavy as a diving suit, the weight of the full-body suit was nevertheless considerable.

LABEL: 0x29FD
STRING: And what's more, it was so airtight that just wearing it was exhausting.

LABEL: 0x2A51
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x2A71
STRING: Despite not having done anything yet, my breathing was ragged.

LABEL: 0x2AA7
STRING: Even the heat of my own breath was irritating.

LABEL: 0x2AD3
STRING: But, this wasn't the time for luxury.

LABEL: 0x2B07
STRING: This time, we might finally be able to escape.

LABEL: 0x2BAC
STRING: No, I was sure of it.

LABEL: 0x2BD2
STRING: This time, the plan was to escape on our own, with no external uncertainties.

LABEL: 0x2C1E
STRING: If only we could do it right――

LABEL: 0x2C44
STRING: I felt a heavy weight on my shoulders.

LABEL: 0x2C72
STRING: What would that weight be?

LABEL: 0x2C96
STRING: The many grudges that sank to the bottom of this sea.

LABEL: 0x2CBC
STRING: The souls that were unable to crawl up to the surface.

LABEL: 0x2CDC
STRING: Precipitation.

LABEL: 0x2F6D
STRING: The sunken rear section passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x2F9B
STRING: The great many dead.

LABEL: 0x2FB9
STRING: The lives I had killed, the many lost lives――

LABEL: 0x3073
STRING: My feet got unsteady.

LABEL: 0x308F
STRING: My vision wavered.

LABEL: 0x30AB
STRING: What I had done...

LABEL: 0x315D
STRING: ...Was a reality that couldn't be changed.

LABEL: 0x3185
STRING: It was already in the past.

LABEL: 0x31A9
STRING: Remorse assailed me, as if condemning me.

LABEL: 0x3254
STRING: I was a terrible person, after all.

LABEL: 0x32F3
STRING: Trying to act like a self-important hero wouldn't change the past.

LABEL: 0x34AD
STRING: After all, ever since then, hadn't I said that we would all make it back alive, even if it was just us survivors?

LABEL: 0x35D0
STRING: And how had that turned out?

LABEL: 0x35EC
STRING: Before I knew it, the Nomura sisters had died, and Hiragino, who had been so good to us, was no longer there.

LABEL: 0x36D8
STRING: It was no good.

LABEL: 0x376B
STRING: There was no way things would turn out well.

LABEL: 0x3806
STRING: No one wished for that.

LABEL: 0x38AB
STRING: How could I believe that those who had died wanted us to live?

LABEL: 0x398C
STRING: We were all going to die anyway. It didn't matter how hard we tried.

LABEL: 0x3A41
STRING: I was sure my sister would――

LABEL: 0x3A99
STRING: 「...Even so.」

LABEL: 0x3B0D
STRING: Even so, we had to live.

LABEL: 0x3B47
STRING: Even if no one wished for it.

LABEL: 0x3B69
STRING: Even if no one chose to do so.

LABEL: 0x3B8B
STRING: Even if we were all alone, we had to live.

LABEL: 0x3BC3
STRING: Do not die.

LABEL: 0x3BE3
STRING: We survived, after all.

LABEL: 0x3C05
STRING: Because those who survived have a duty to continue living.

LABEL: 0x3C4B
STRING: That's why――

LABEL: 0x3CC0
STRING: 「...Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x3CDC
STRING: Don't tremble.

LABEL: 0x3CF4
STRING: Take the first step.

LABEL: 0x3D12
STRING: At this very moment, those two were waiting for me to return if nothing else.

LABEL: 0x3D58
STRING: I had left Yukari and Tokiwa behind in the hallway downstairs.

LABEL: 0x3D8C
STRING: Yukari no longer had her speargun.

LABEL: 0x3DB4
STRING: They didn't have any weapons.

LABEL: 0x3DDC
STRING: I had left them in the hallway to avoid being locked inside a room somewhere and losing their escape route, but nevertheless,

LABEL: 0x3E30
STRING: if the light were to attack the two of them, they would have no way to fight it.

LABEL: 0x3E7C
STRING: The light moved as a group, most likely.

LABEL: 0x3EB0
STRING: So, as long as it was still in the emergency room, there would be no threat to them.

LABEL: 0x3F12
STRING: But, I couldn't be sure of it.

LABEL: 0x3F5E
STRING: Either way, I had to do what I came here for and get back to the two of them as soon as possible...

LABEL: 0x404E
STRING: I climbed the stairs.

LABEL: 0x406C
STRING: I soon caught sight of the door to the wheelhouse, but I had no business there right now.

LABEL: 0x40A6
STRING: I walked down the hallway with heavy steps.

LABEL: 0x4133
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x414D
STRING: Just around the curve, "it" was there.

LABEL: 0x4282
STRING: If only it was gone... I dreamed.

LABEL: 0x42B6
STRING: A mass of light.

LABEL: 0x42CC
STRING: Just outside the door to the emergency room, there was a thick layer of strange colors.

LABEL: 0x4316
STRING: There was a scent of death in the air.

LABEL: 0x432E
STRING: And, the swelling, wriggling light.

LABEL: 0x4350
STRING: At the center of it all was――

LABEL: 0x4739
STRING: Don't think about it.

LABEL: 0x4755
STRING: I mustn't think about it.

LABEL: 0x4775
STRING: There was no point in making sure.

LABEL: 0x479D
STRING: What would I do if I knew?

LABEL: 0x48B0
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x48C8
STRING: A sky-blue fabric was visible from beneath the mass of light.

LABEL: 0x48F8
STRING: Something dark and red was flowing from it.

LABEL: 0x491C
STRING: The scene in front of me overwhelmed my thoughts and awakened the perception I was avoiding.

LABEL: 0x4A52
STRING: I understood.

LABEL: 0x4A72
STRING: I knew what it was.

LABEL: 0x4A92
STRING: Hiragino――

LABEL: 0x4AA8
STRING: 「You promised...」

LABEL: 0x4B39
STRING: That was just shifting the blame.

LABEL: 0x4B53
STRING: I was only venting my own incompetence on him.

LABEL: 0x4B8D
STRING: I was only directing my sorrow and helplessness at him.

LABEL: 0x4BD1
STRING: His words that we'd all escape together stabbed vainly at my heart.

LABEL: 0x4C11
STRING: ...I couldn't let anyone die anymore.

LABEL: 0x4C45
STRING: I would get over Hiragino's death and move on.

LABEL: 0x4D70
STRING: I walked toward the light slowly.

LABEL: 0x4D9A
STRING: The light didn't seem to notice me, nor did it react to me.

LABEL: 0x4DE6
STRING: It was tranquil and glowing gently.

LABEL: 0x4E26
STRING: As if the brutality from before was all a lie.

LABEL: 0x4E54
STRING: By this thing, Hiragino was――

LABEL: 0x4F4C
STRING: My emotions almost got the better of me.

LABEL: 0x4F66
STRING: The urge to beat them to death while they weren't resisting at the moment welled up inside me.

LABEL: 0x5027
STRING: 「Think about what you should do yourself.」

LABEL: 0x513F
STRING: 「...That's right.」

LABEL: 0x515B
STRING: I took a deep breath and calmed my heart.

LABEL: 0x518D
STRING: Think about what I should be doing now.

LABEL: 0x51BB
STRING: Spurred on by those thoughts, I cleared my mind, which was heading toward a dead end.

LABEL: 0x5203
STRING: 「...Let's go.」

LABEL: 0x5311
STRING: No lights were on in the emergency room, as usual.

LABEL: 0x5351
STRING: That's right... We were here just a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x5391
STRING: I was standing near the door.

LABEL: 0x53BD
STRING: Yukari, Tokiwa, Hiragino, and Reiri were...

LABEL: 0x53F3
STRING: ...Alive.

LABEL: 0x540D
STRING: They were alive...

LABEL: 0x542F
STRING: I couldn't afford to get sentimental now.

LABEL: 0x545B
STRING: If I didn't hurry up and retrieve the diving suits――

LABEL: 0x54E6
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0x54FC
STRING: A mass of light caught my eyes again.

LABEL: 0x551E
STRING: It was a mountain of light, like some kind of cocoon.

LABEL: 0x5544
STRING: It looked to be a little smaller than the one outside.

LABEL: 0x5586
STRING: No, that was probably just my imagination.

LABEL: 0x55B6
STRING: Because I knew what was inside it.

LABEL: 0x55F0
STRING: I knew who was there.

LABEL: 0x59F5
STRING: For a moment, my feet suddenly headed in that direction.

LABEL: 0x5A23
STRING: I immediately stopped and turned around.

LABEL: 0x5ACE
STRING: Because there was nothing I could do for her.

LABEL: 0x5AFE
STRING: There was nothing I could do for Hiragino or Reiri,

LABEL: 0x5B30
STRING: no matter how painful it was seeing their dead bodies lying here.

LABEL: 0x5B8C
STRING: This wasn't the time to indulge in needless sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x5BCE
STRING: What I could do right now was something different.

LABEL: 0x5CE9
STRING: I looked around.

LABEL: 0x5D03
STRING: Two diving suits were lying in a corner of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x5D39
STRING: Careful not to provoke the light, I slowly approached them and lifted one of them up.

LABEL: 0x5E0C
STRING: A strange voice escaped my lips.

LABEL: 0x5E2A
STRING: It was heavier than I expected.

LABEL: 0x5E48
STRING: I grabbed the suit with both hands, but it rose only a few inches.

LABEL: 0x5E9E
STRING: Way too heavy――

LABEL: 0x5EB8
STRING: But thankfully, the animal costume's hands had a rubber coating to prevent slipping.

LABEL: 0x5F16
STRING: I could manage to hold it, but...

LABEL: 0x5F3E
STRING: Would I be able to carry the suit while bent over like this...?

LABEL: 0x5F8E
STRING: 「...Nothing to it.」

LABEL: 0x5FB2
STRING: With that, I put my hands on the diving suit again.

LABEL: 0x6101
STRING: By the time I somehow managed to carry the two sets of suits out into the hallway, it was already around 14:00.

LABEL: 0x6147
STRING: The two I left on the second floor must be worried.

LABEL: 0x6187
STRING: I moved the diving suits away from the emergency room and into the hallway in front of the wheelhouse,

LABEL: 0x61D7
STRING: while being as careful as possible not to look at the mass of light that threatened to enter my field of vision.

LABEL: 0x6229
STRING: 「Alright――」

LABEL: 0x6243
STRING: This completed the recovery of the diving suits...

LABEL: 0x626F
STRING: ――Wait.

LABEL: 0x6287
STRING: There was still something else.

LABEL: 0x62A9
STRING: Remembering something I had completely forgotten, I went back to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x62FB
STRING: It was an instruction from Yukari.

LABEL: 0x6463
STRING: 「In addition to retrieving the diving suits, there's one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x649B
STRING: 「In order to escape using this method, there's something that must be done.」

LABEL: 0x64ED
STRING: 「I want you to do that as well, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6528
STRING: 「...And what would that be?」

LABEL: 0x6559
STRING: 「Please close the hatch of the rescue ship from the outside.」

LABEL: 0x658F
STRING: 「You should be able to close it using an external handle.」

LABEL: 0x65D8
STRING: 「How old fashioned...」

LABEL: 0x65FE
STRING: Even though it was a generation old, it was still a ROMLES submarine, right?

LABEL: 0x670F
STRING: 「That's exactly why it's safer.」

LABEL: 0x6751
STRING: 「To begin with, the hatch is basically always under the pressure of water.」

LABEL: 0x67A9
STRING: 「The power to go from "outside to inside" is enhanced underwater.」

LABEL: 0x6800
STRING: 「So, I'll be counting on you for that as well.」

LABEL: 0x6843
STRING: 「Sure, got it.」

LABEL: 0x68DE
STRING: 「...In fact, that might be more dangerous.」

LABEL: 0x69A7
STRING: The way to the pressurization room was open.

LABEL: 0x69C9
STRING: Avoiding the mass of light, I entered it and looked up at the hatch on the ceiling...

LABEL: 0x6A17
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x6A31
STRING: I couldn't turn my head.

LABEL: 0x6A4F
STRING: ...Damn it. I couldn't move my head properly with this thing on.

LABEL: 0x6A87
STRING: What the hell?

LABEL: 0x6AA3
STRING: This wasn't a gag manga or anything like that...

LABEL: 0x6AD7
STRING: Come one, turn――

LABEL: 0x6AF7
STRING: Holding the head of my costume with both hands, I shook it left and right and twisted it.

LABEL: 0x6BF1
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x6C0B
STRING: Just then.

LABEL: 0x6C1F
STRING: The eyes of the macaroni penguin began to glow.

LABEL: 0x6C4F
STRING: Hey, what was this all of a sudden?

LABEL: 0x6C79
STRING: Come to think of it, she did say its eyes could glow... This really was a gag manga, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x6CD1
STRING: Nevertheless...

LABEL: 0x6CE7
STRING: The light emanating from the eyes of the macaroni penguin produced an unexpected effect.

LABEL: 0x6D31
STRING: At the other end of the path they illuminated...

LABEL: 0x6D51
STRING: I looked up at the ceiling and saw the underside of the hatch.

LABEL: 0x6D85
STRING: All right, if I closed this, my mission would be complete.

LABEL: 0x6DB9
STRING: Slowly, I reached out my hand, wrapped in the costume――

LABEL: 0x6E56
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x6E6C
STRING: At the other side of the hatch――

LABEL: 0x6E8A
STRING: There were some strange-looking markings.

LABEL: 0x6EB6
STRING: What are...?

LABEL: 0x6ECE
STRING: It was something like a thin scar,

LABEL: 0x6EEA
STRING: as if some scratches were painted over.

LABEL: 0x6F2A
STRING: This wasn't the time for it, but I couldn't help but get distracted.

LABEL: 0x6F62
STRING: I peered at the scar like I was drawn to it――

LABEL: 0x6F9C
STRING: ...Was this some sort of writing?

LABEL: 0x6FBC
STRING: It was hard to make out, but――

LABEL: 0x6FE2
STRING: I saw it, midsummer snow.

LABEL: 0x70FE
STRING: I saw it,

LABEL: 0x7131
STRING: midsummer snow.

LABEL: 0x7388
STRING: ――What...?

LABEL: 0x73A0
STRING: What is this?

LABEL: 0x73BC
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x73D4
STRING: Something flickered in my mind.

LABEL: 0x73F6
STRING: Why were...?

LABEL: 0x7416
STRING: Why were those words at a place like this...?

LABEL: 0x74B1
STRING: I closed the hatch.

LABEL: 0x74CF
STRING: As if gently blocking off what I had just seen.

LABEL: 0x7501
STRING: It was strange.

LABEL: 0x7519
STRING: There was definitely something wrong...

LABEL: 0x7545
STRING: Something was prying open my memories.

LABEL: 0x756F
STRING: That was...

LABEL: 0x7587
STRING: What was it?

LABEL: 0x75A3
STRING: Once the letters disappeared from my field of vision, I began to lose track of whether I'd actually seen them in the first place.

LABEL: 0x7609
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x761F
STRING: It had to be some sort of mistake.

LABEL: 0x764F
STRING: Or a hallucination.

LABEL: 0x766D
STRING: ――But, was it?

LABEL: 0x7687
STRING: If I reached out, I'd be able to check right away.

LABEL: 0x76B7
STRING: All I had to do was open that hatch. One more time.

LABEL: 0x76E9
STRING: That's right... I'd just grab that handle a few centimeters away...

LABEL: 0x7743
STRING: I pulled back my outstretched hand.

LABEL: 0x776B
STRING: ――It was impossible.

LABEL: 0x7789
STRING: It was impossible for it to exist.

LABEL: 0x77B5
STRING: Impossible...

LABEL: 0x77D5
STRING: I looked away from the hatch.

LABEL: 0x77F9
STRING: Forget what I just saw.

LABEL: 0x7821
STRING: The pressurization room. I put my feet on the stairs that extended outside its door.

LABEL: 0x7960
STRING: As I descended the stairs to the emergency room, right then...

LABEL: 0x79A4
STRING: Something moved...

LABEL: 0x7A49
STRING: It was that light.

LABEL: 0x7A67
STRING: It hadn't made a single move until just a moment ago. However, it was now gathering around me.

LABEL: 0x7AC9
STRING: ――I've been noticed?!

LABEL: 0x7AE9
STRING: Why?!

LABEL: 0x7AFF
STRING: Everything was fine until just now――

LABEL: 0x7B37
STRING: 「...Shit!」

LABEL: 0x7B55
STRING: The eyes!

LABEL: 0x7B71
STRING: I smacked my head, trying to turn off the lights.

LABEL: 0x7B9F
STRING: All the while, the light was closing in on me.

LABEL: 0x7BC7
STRING: If I ran, I might be able to escape from the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x7C05
STRING: But, there was light outside, too...

LABEL: 0x7CAC
STRING: I wasn't sure if I was going to make it――

LABEL: 0x7CD8
STRING: Just as I was about to give up...

LABEL: 0x7D9A
STRING: A lit flashlight was thrown into the room.

LABEL: 0x7DD0
STRING: The target of the light changed thanks to the metal flashlight.

LABEL: 0x7E78
STRING: 「Now!」

LABEL: 0x7E92
STRING: 「Run!!」

LABEL: 0x7EB9
STRING: Yukari peeked inside through the door.

LABEL: 0x7ED9
STRING: I started running for my life as fast as I could in my heavy costume.

LABEL: 0x802B
STRING: The diving suits were retrieved, and the hatch of the rescue ship was closed.

LABEL: 0x8065
STRING: The mission assigned to me was successfully completed.

LABEL: 0x8097
STRING: ...However, I couldn't get what just happened out of my mind.

LABEL: 0x80DD
STRING: Those words written on the hatch of the rescue ship...

LABEL: 0x810F
STRING: Try as I might, I couldn't forget them.

LABEL: 0x8141
STRING: What was that all about...?

LABEL: 0x816B
STRING: Why were those words in a place like that?

LABEL: 0x81A1
STRING: ――No. I'd think about it later.

LABEL: 0x81CD
STRING: Right now, what needed to be done was right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x82EA
STRING: 「Now then.」

LABEL: 0x8305
STRING: Tokiwa raised her voice again.

LABEL: 0x8342
STRING: 「What we need to do next is...」

LABEL: 0x8364
STRING: 「First, remove the ballast from the rescue ship. That hasn't changed, has it?」

LABEL: 0x83C1
STRING: 「No. As I explained earlier, it shouldn't be a complicated procedure.」

LABEL: 0x8411
STRING: 「You should be able to see the ballast easily from the outside.」

LABEL: 0x844C
STRING: Physically removing the ballast from the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x847A
STRING: That would reduce the weight, and the rescue ship would be able to surface...

LABEL: 0x84BE
STRING: Between that and the manually-operated hatch from before, the ship's design felt very old-fashioned, but that must have been proof of its trustworthiness.

LABEL: 0x855E
STRING: There was one thing that bothered me.

LABEL: 0x858A
STRING: 「If we remove the ballast, won't the rescue ship start surfacing on its own?」

LABEL: 0x85F5
STRING: 「The <SHEEP III> is currently attached to the rescue ship by a connecting skirt, so there's no problem.」

LABEL: 0x8659
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x8677
STRING: 「Conversely, when it comes time to get the ship moving, that connection has to be severed.」

LABEL: 0x874B
STRING: 「...That's correct.」

LABEL: 0x8770
STRING: The term "connecting skirt" was unfamiliar to me.

LABEL: 0x87A6
STRING: As the name implied, it was probably designed to connect ships to each other, but...

LABEL: 0x87E6
STRING: 「How are the two ships connected to each other in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x88AE
STRING: 「Right. Allow me to explain.」

LABEL: 0x8971
STRING: 「The lower part of the rescue ship has a hemispherical, pressure-resistant section called a skirt.」

LABEL: 0x89C1
STRING: 「Once it's placed over the rescue hatch of <SHEEP III> and magnetically secured...」

LABEL: 0x8A73
STRING: 「Seawater is then drained from the connecting skirt, and the air pressure in the skirt and the pressurization room is equalized.」

LABEL: 0x8B40
STRING: 「This creates a sort of air tunnel between the connecting skirt and the pressurization room.」

LABEL: 0x8B9C
STRING: 「The skirt is pressed against the surface of the <SHEEP III> by water pressure, so it won't detach.」

LABEL: 0x8C06
STRING: In short, once the pressure was adjusted and the ships were connected, there was no need to worry about them detaching from each other.

LABEL: 0x8C58
STRING: 「So, in order for them to disconnect――」

LABEL: 0x8CA1
STRING: 「With the rescue hatch connecting the pressurization room to the surrounding sea open,

LABEL: 0x8D46
STRING: the pressurization room can be flooded with water and pressurized.」

LABEL: 0x8DDB
STRING: 「If you do that, the inside and outside of the skirt will be filled with water, and there will be no difference in pressure.」

LABEL: 0x8E23
STRING: 「As such, detachment should be easy.」

LABEL: 0x8E58
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x8E76
STRING: 「You closed the rescue ship's hatch earlier, right, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x8FDE
STRING: Yukari glanced at me.

LABEL: 0x9006
STRING: The task of closing the hatch was simple enough.

LABEL: 0x903A
STRING: But I felt like it wasn't something one should do wearing a stupid costume like this...

LABEL: 0x9083
STRING: 「Which means that all that's left is to remove the ballast.」

LABEL: 0x90B9
STRING: 「We flood the room with water and pressurize it.」

LABEL: 0x913C
STRING: 「That should be all.」

LABEL: 0x915F
STRING: What needed to be done had been decided.

LABEL: 0x9185
STRING: There were no problems.

LABEL: 0x91A3
STRING: ...But, no one moved.

LABEL: 0x91CB
STRING: We couldn't.

LABEL: 0x91E3
STRING: We were frozen in this moment.

LABEL: 0x9237
STRING: ――There were no problems.

LABEL: 0x925B
STRING: Except for one that we were intentionally ignoring.

LABEL: 0x92CD
STRING: Tokiwa spoke up as if she couldn't stand the silence anymore.

LABEL: 0x9316
STRING: 「Who's going to wear the diving suits?」

LABEL: 0x934B
STRING: Yes.

LABEL: 0x935F
STRING: The pressure-resistant diving suits were lying beside us.

LABEL: 0x938F
STRING: The ones I'd just carried here from the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x941E
STRING: ――Two.

LABEL: 0x9436
STRING: There were only two of them.

LABEL: 0x9472
STRING: Who would wear them? In other words, who would escape?

LABEL: 0x94A2
STRING: ...The answer was obvious.

LABEL: 0x94C8
STRING: But, I couldn't say it out loud.

LABEL: 0x94EE
STRING: ...Because if I did, they were bound to object.

LABEL: 0x9608
STRING: Yukari was probably thinking the same thing.

LABEL: 0x963E
STRING: Who should wear the diving suits?

LABEL: 0x9666
STRING: ――The answer she came up with was different from mine.

LABEL: 0x9724
STRING: 「It's obvious.」

LABEL: 0x9744
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x976A
STRING: 「You two should wear them.」

LABEL: 0x979D
STRING: 「Yukari-san, you said you wouldn't waste your life...」

LABEL: 0x983D
STRING: 「That's not what this is about.」

LABEL: 0x9890
STRING: She cut me off and began to speak in an indifferent tone.

LABEL: 0x9936
STRING: 「I'm the chief attendant of the <SHEEP III>, first of all.」

LABEL: 0x9973
STRING: 「My responsibility is to ensure the safety of all passengers, including you.」

LABEL: 0x99BD
STRING: 「I'm also responsible for this situation as a member of ROMLES on top of that...」

LABEL: 0x9A1B
STRING: 「And above all, I have a responsibility to see this ship through to its end.」

LABEL: 0x9A6F
STRING: 「That's...」

LABEL: 0x9A8B
STRING: In terms of position and title, she might be right.

LABEL: 0x9AC3
STRING: But was that really fine?

LABEL: 0x9AEF
STRING: ...There was no way.

LABEL: 0x9B1B
STRING: 「Didn't Hiragino-san say this wasn't a matter of titles?」

LABEL: 0x9B61
STRING: 「I'm sure you can come up with any number of reasons based on your position, but...」

LABEL: 0x9C2D
STRING: 「――I personally want you and Tokiwa-san to survive.」

LABEL: 0x9CA2
STRING: She smiled as she said it.

LABEL: 0x9CD2
STRING: A sad smile.

LABEL: 0x9CEE
STRING: The same kind that Hiragino had on the brink of his death.

LABEL: 0x9D1C
STRING: Calm and powerful.

LABEL: 0x9D4B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9D65
STRING: 「I knew you'd object to my proposal.」

LABEL: 0x9DA7
STRING: 「You don't want anyone else to die because of you anymore... That's what it comes down to.」

LABEL: 0x9E8C
STRING: 「But then, I could say the same thing.」

LABEL: 0x9ED6
STRING: 「...It was the same with your sister.」

LABEL: 0x9F08
STRING: 「Why must I be the only one to survive?」

LABEL: 0x9F42
STRING: 「That's a recurring thought of mine.」

LABEL: 0x9F73
STRING: Her tone was gentle and admonishing.

LABEL: 0x9F97
STRING: Her reasoning was kind.

LABEL: 0x9FC0
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, is there any reason why you should stay on this ship more than I do?」

LABEL: 0xA01D
STRING: 「It would be... appropriate for me to stay.」

LABEL: 0xA056
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0xA0CD
STRING: 「I know the <SHEEP III> better than anyone.」

LABEL: 0xA0FE
STRING: 「I'm the one in charge of the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0xA12F
STRING: 「I love the <SHEEP III> the most.」

LABEL: 0xA160
STRING: 「So, I can't let you two stay.」

LABEL: 0xA19F
STRING: Her logic... No, it was just sophistry.

LABEL: 0xA1D3
STRING: But I knew.

LABEL: 0xA1FB
STRING: It was the same as when Yukari gave up on trying to stop me.

LABEL: 0xA231
STRING: No matter how strong and correct the logic was, she would never back down.

LABEL: 0xA287
STRING: 「...Okay.」

LABEL: 0xA2B4
STRING: 「Thank you.」

LABEL: 0xA2DF
STRING: Don't say that...!

LABEL: 0xA319
STRING: It wasn't because Yukari had talked me into wearing the diving suit that I decided to do so.

LABEL: 0xA385
STRING: Most likely, the ballast removal would have to be done while wearing that heavy suit on the ladder extending from the <SHEEP III> rescue hatch.

LABEL: 0xA41A
STRING: It would be both strenuous and dangerous.

LABEL: 0xA44A
STRING: 「I'll take care of removing the ballast.」

LABEL: 0xA48B
STRING: 「I'll leave it to you.」

LABEL: 0xA4AE
STRING: And so, our roles were divided.

LABEL: 0xA563
STRING: While Yukari and I were arguing, Tokiwa was staring into space.

LABEL: 0xA5A3
STRING: By herself, without saying anything.

LABEL: 0xA5C5
STRING: Without saying anything...

LABEL: 0xA5E3
STRING: What was she thinking?

LABEL: 0xA613
STRING: It wasn't something I could ask her.

LABEL: 0xA6B8
STRING: 「The observation deck in the rear section.」

LABEL: 0xA6DA
STRING: 「It's possible to get out through that broken windowpane.」

LABEL: 0xA71F
STRING: We were discussing the method to remove the ballast.

LABEL: 0xA749
STRING: As Yukari had told us, the ballast itself might be something that could be easily removed once you got near it.

LABEL: 0xA7AB
STRING: The problem was getting out of the ship in the first place.

LABEL: 0xA956
STRING: 「Since the rescue ship is connected to the hatch in the emergency room, we can't use it.」

LABEL: 0xA99E
STRING: 「So, going out from the rear section is a reasonable choice...」

LABEL: 0xAA48
STRING: 「We can make use of the elevator again.」

LABEL: 0xAA7A
STRING: 「Just like when we rescued Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0xAAAD
STRING: Using the elevator, we connected the safe section of the first floor to the flooded section of the second...

LABEL: 0xAAF9
STRING: In theory, it would be possible to go underwater, just like during Reiri's rescue.

LABEL: 0xABB3
STRING: 「Just a moment, please.」

LABEL: 0xABDB
STRING: 「It's naive to think that things will work out the same way they did back then.」

LABEL: 0xAC27
STRING: 「That time it was a descent, but we now need to go up one floor.」

LABEL: 0xACD0
STRING: 「It would be too much to ask for someone to climb the wire while wearing a 100-kilogram diving suit.」

LABEL: 0xAD3C
STRING: 「But... if that's the only way, then I'll just have to do it.」

LABEL: 0xAD7C
STRING: Wearing the macaroni penguin suit had sapped me of my energy, for sure.

LABEL: 0xADC8
STRING: And, if I overworked myself in this state, then...

LABEL: 0xAE06
STRING: If it were up to me alone, I would do it in a heartbeat.

LABEL: 0xAE50
STRING: But, if I couldn't remove the ballast properly, Tokiwa wouldn't be able to escape.

LABEL: 0xAEA0
STRING: People's lives depended on my actions this time――

LABEL: 0xAFB3
STRING: 「Understood.」

LABEL: 0xAFD1
STRING: 「Then, let us use the same method as before.」

LABEL: 0xB012
STRING: Tokiwa clapped her hands together.

LABEL: 0xB042
STRING: She held them together in front of her chest as if praying.

LABEL: 0xB099
STRING: 「Once you enter the elevator from the first floor of the rear section,

LABEL: 0xB0DB
STRING: we'll operate the elevator and close the doors on the first floor.」

LABEL: 0xB10B
STRING: 「After that, we'll open the door on the second floor and fill the shaft with water.」

LABEL: 0xB1B0
STRING: 「You'll be able to go up to the second floor using buoyancy.」

LABEL: 0xB1E0
STRING: 「Wouldn't that make things a little easier?」

LABEL: 0xB21B
STRING: It was like a re-enactment of what we did before.

LABEL: 0xB243
STRING: Come to think of it, we were able to rescue Reiri back then thanks to the strategy that Tokiwa came up with as well.

LABEL: 0xB2A1
STRING: 「Is the elevator still operable from this section?」

LABEL: 0xB355
STRING: 「...I'd like to believe so. The battery is independent, so the power should be fine, but...」」

LABEL: 0xB416
STRING: 「I'm afraid that the elevator itself may be damaged thanks to how we used it while rescuing Reiri.」

LABEL: 0xB49D
STRING: 「It's worth a try, anyway.」

LABEL: 0xB4DC
STRING: Tokiwa spoke nonchalantly despite the situation.

LABEL: 0xB51A
STRING: It was somehow reassuring that she was still like she always was, even though we were this close to making it out of here.

LABEL: 0xB5F6
STRING: 「It'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0xB614
STRING: 「In the worst-case scenario, as long as the watertight doors on the first-floor bridge function, it'll be okay.」

LABEL: 0xB65A
STRING: 「So, even if the elevator doors don't close properly and the rear section is completely submerged, we can manage.」

LABEL: 0xB6BD
STRING: ...I didn't want to think about that possibility.

LABEL: 0xB6E5
STRING: I guess it didn't matter what happened to the <SHEEP III> anymore, but...

LABEL: 0xB736
STRING: Yukari, who had just spoken of her love for this submarine, was looking very tense.

LABEL: 0xB7F6
STRING: 「W-Well...」

LABEL: 0xB86D
STRING: 「...Let's just trust that it's going to be okay.」
